gameOverPopup.title: GAME OVER
gameOverPopup.message:
Greetings,

It looks like you were unable to meet your daily goal. Don't worry, this is just a temporary setback on your journey towards success.

As they say, everything is impermanent and constantly changing. Just like this temporary loss is a part of the larger cycle of your career, and today failure is a stepping stone towards future success.

Take this opportunity to reflect on your performance and identify areas for improvement. Use this as motivation to work harder and spin more wisely the next time you join Samsara Corp.

Remember, success is just a spin away! Until then, may you be blessed with many more opportunities for growth and enlightenment.

Best,
The Karma Department, Samsara Corp.

steps.firstMissionGoal:
This is your first goal.
Click anywhere to continue.





By clicking you agree with Terms & Conditions and Privacy Policy.
steps.firstMissionClose: Close the popup to start spinning.
steps.firstWin: Symbols on the reels give coins.
steps.firstAddSymbolIntro: After every spin you can choose a new symbol to add.
steps.firstAddSymbolSingleSymbolDesc: Read symbols description to understand how to get more coins.
steps.addSymbolSkipButton: If none of the symbols looks good, just close the window.
steps.firstMissionBonusIntro: Congrats, you're given 2 Removes and 2 Re-rolls!
steps.firstMissionBonusRerolls: Press the Re-rolls button to get new symbols
steps.firstRemoveIntro:
You can see
all your symbols
in the inventory.
steps.firstRemoveSymbolInfo:
Click on a symbol
to read more
about it.
steps.firstRemoveSymbolButton:
Click on the delete button,
to remove the symbol.

default.message:
Keep going!
You're in the endless mode now.

mission1.message:
Greetings,

We, the Namaste Department of Samsara Corp, welcome you to this new journey of growth and learning. As you embark on your role as a slot machine operator, we would like to extend a warm greeting of peace and respect to you.

Your goal for today is {coins} coins in {spins} spins, and we have faith in your abilities to reach it. However, we also want to emphasize the importance of mindfulness and inner peace in your work. The choices you make and the actions you take should come from a place of stillness and clarity.

May your day be filled with success and may the peace within you guide you towards it.

Namaste,
The Namaste Department, Samsara Corp.

mission2.message:
Greetings,

This is your second day as a Slot Machine Operator at Samsara Corp, and we hope your journey so far has been fulfilling.

We would like to remind you of the importance of meeting your production goals as outlined in your production plan: {coins} coins in {spins} spins.

We have received reports of some operators failing to meet their daily goals, and we would like to remind you that consistent performance is crucial for success within the cycle of Samsara.

If you have any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to reach out to your Operations Supervisor, John Willhorse.

Best regards,
Samsara Corp's Journey Department

mission3.message:
Greetings Operators,

Welcome to day 3 of our amazing journey together at Samsara Corp. I just know that you've been crushing it so far, and I have no doubt that today will be no exception.

Today, your goal is to make {coins} coins in {spins} spins. Now, I know that might sound like a lot, but remember: "Sometimes I'll start a sentence, and I don't even know where it's going. I just hope I find it along the way." That's the spirit!

And if you need a little extra boost, just think about how great it would feel to be a recipient of the coveted Dundie award for Best Slot Machine Operator. Yes, that's right, the Dundies are coming to Samsara Corp, and I'm going to make sure you're front and center.

So go out there and give it your best shot. You got this, my friend!

Yours in productivity and laughter,
John Willhorse
Operations Supervisor

mission4.message:
Greetings,

As a member of the Karma Department at Samsara Corp, we would like to remind you of the importance of balance and consequences in life and in your role as a slot machine operator.

Your goal for today is {coins} coins in {spins} spins, and we believe in your ability to achieve it. However, we would like to remind you that actions have consequences, and that the choices you make in your job will have a ripple effect not only in your life, but also in the lives of others.

Please consider this carefully as you work towards your goal. May the balance of your actions lead to positive outcomes and success.

Best,
The Karma Department, Samsara Corp.

mission5.message:
Greetings Slot Machine Operators!

This is your favorite Operator Supervisor, Burt Monkeymind, here to inspire and motivate you for another day of spinning and winning at Samsara Corp.

Your goal for today is {coins} coins in {spins} spins, and let me tell you, I have faith in each and every one of you. You are the cream of the crop, the top dogs, the elite of the elite!

But don't let that get to your head, because as we all know, too much of anything is a bad thing. So, go ahead and spin those reels, but don't forget to pace yourselves. We wouldn't want any machine malfunctions, now would we?

Remember, a well-oiled machine is a happy machine, and a happy machine means happy operators and happy superiors.

Let's make it happen!

Your pal,
Burt Monkeymind
Operator Supervisor, Samsara Corp.

mission6.message:
Greetings Operators,

It's John Willhorse, your trusty Operations Supervisor here to give you the rundown for the day. Today's goal is {coins} coins in {spins} spins and I have faith that you can do it. But before we get to that, let me address some recent, uh, incidents that have come to my attention.

Burt Monkeymind, who I thought was just a quirky character, has been causing some trouble. I don't want to get into specifics though.

Now, I know we all have our quirks and unique ways of doing things, but Burt is taking it to a whole new level. He's been trying to bring in his absurd ideas, like using beets as currency and singing about them. It's all just a bit too much for me to handle.

So, let's focus on the task at hand today and leave the beet-singing to Burt. {coins} coins in {spins} spins, people! Let's do this!

Best,
John Willhorse
Operations Supervisor

mission7.message:
Alright folks, this is Burt Monkeymind, Operator Supervisor, speaking.

I hope everyone's having a great day and hitting their goals. Except for you, John Willhorse. You know what, I've had it up to here with your passive-aggressive messages and your lack of respect for our department. I've got a job to do here, and I'm going to do it with or without your approval.

So here's my message for today:
Get your act together and let's hit that goal of {coins} coins in {spins} spins.

I believe in you, Samsara Corp employees, and I know you'll get it done.


And as for John, let's just say he better watch his back.

Namaste.

mission8.message:
Greetings operators,

This is the Shanti Department, spreading peace and tranquility throughout Samsara Corp. It has come to our attention that there seems to be some tension between Burt Monkeymind and John Willhorse.

We understand that both are highly competitive and dedicated operators, but remember that according to the teachings of Buddhism, anger only leads to suffering. So let's put aside our differences and work towards a common goal: {coins} coins in {spins} spins!

We suggest using the power of mindfulness to stay focused and in the moment. After all, as the Buddha once said, "If you miss the present moment, you miss your appointment with life."

Let's make the most of each spin and achieve our goal together, in peace and harmony.

Best,
The Shanti Department, Samsara Corp.

mission9.message:
Dear Operators,

My name is Akshobhya and as a C-Level Manager of the Samsara Corp. I bring a message of stability, peace, and resolution. I have been observing the recent conflict between Burt Monkeymind and John Willhorse, and I believe it is time for us to put aside our differences and focus on our goal as a company.

Your goal for today is {coins} coins in {spins} spins, and I have no doubt that together, as a united team, you can achieve this. Let us channel the energy of Akshobhya and work together in harmony to bring balance and stability to our operations.

Remember, a calm and centered mind leads to success in all endeavors. Let us strive towards this goal with a clear and peaceful mind.

Namaste,
Akshobhya, on behalf of the Board of Directors and C-Level Managers of Samsara Corp.

mission10.message:
Greetings Slot Machine Operators!

This is Burt Monkeymind, and I hope everyone had a productive 9th day on the job. Now, I have a bone to pick with the Shanti Department and our resident Akshobhya. What is the deal with trying to solve my conflict with John Willhorse? I can handle my own affairs, thank you very much!

As for today's goal, let's aim for a whopping {coins} coins in {spins} spins. I know we can do it if we work together and focus on what really matters - generating profits for Samsara Corp!

Just remember, I am the one in charge here, and I expect everyone to listen to me. Let's get to work!

Best,
Burt Monkeymind, Slot Machine Operator

mission11.message:
Greetings Operators,

It's John here, and I just wanted to say that I couldn't agree more with Burt's message from yesterday. These folks in the Shanti Department and Akshobhya just don't seem to understand the real world. All they do is spout philosophical nonsense and try to mediate every little disagreement. Well, I've got news for them, this ain't no monastery, it's a job, and we've got quotas to meet.

Today, our goal is {coins} coins in {spins} spins, and I know we can do it, but we need to focus on the task at hand, not all this distracting nonsense. So let's get to work and show the Shanti Department and Akshobhya what we're made of.

Best,
John Willhorse
Operations Supervisor

mission12.message:
Greetings Slot Machine Operators,

It's John Willhorse and Burt Monkeymind here, and we've got something to say. We're tired of being ignored by the Shanti Department and Akshobhya. They say they're here to resolve conflicts, but it seems like they're just making things worse.

We're both beyond angry, and we're not going to take it anymore. Our previous messages clearly fell on deaf ears, so we've decided to team up and voice our frustrations together.

Our goal for today is {coins} coins in {spins} spins, and we're determined to reach it. But we won't stop there. We're going to keep pushing until someone starts paying attention to us and our concerns.

Sincerely,
John Willhorse & Burt Monkeymind

mission13.message:
Greetings, fellow employees of Samsara Corp.

The Karma Department, as the guardians of the balance of the universe, has been monitoring the recent actions of Burt Monkeymind and John Willhorse. We have taken the situation into consideration and have come to a conclusion that both of them need a fresh start in the Samsara Corp.

In order to give them a chance to reevaluate their actions, the Karma Department has decided to assign Burt and John to new positions as interns. We believe that this will give them a better understanding of the company's values and principles, and a chance to grow as employees.

However, the Karma Department is still hopeful that we all can work together to reach our common goal of {coins} coins in {spins} spins.

Let's show some support for Burt and John in their new positions as interns, and we hope to see positive results from them soon.

Signed,
The Karma Department

amethyst.title: Amethyst
amethyst.description: Whenever another symbol makes this symbol give additional coins, this symbol permanently gives 1 more coins.

anchor.title: Anchor
anchor.description: Gives 4 coins more when in a corner.

banana_peel.title: Banana Peel
banana_peel.description: Destroys adjacent Theif. Destroys itself afterwards.

bar_of_soap.title: Bar of Soap
bar_of_soap.description: Adds a @symbols.bubble.title@ symbol each spin. Destroys itself after giving coins 3 times.

bartender.title: Bartender
bartender.description: Has a 10% chance of adding @symbols.beer.title@, @symbols.wine.title@ or @symbols.martini.title@.

bear.title: Bear
bear.description: Destroys adjacent @symbols.honey.title@ symbols and gives 40 coins for each.

bee.title: Bee
bee.description: Adjacent Flower, Beehive and Honey give 2x more coins. Gives 1 more coins for each adjacent Flower, Beehive or Honey.

big_ore.title: Big Ore
big_ore.description: Adds 2 symbols out of @symbols.amethyst.title@, @symbols.pearl.title@, @symbols.shiny_pebble.title@, @symbols.sapphire.title@, @symbols.emerald.title@, @symbols.ruby.title@ or @symbols.diamond_gem.title@ when destroyed.

billionaire.title: Billionaire
billionaire.description: Adjacent @symbols.cheese.title@ and @symbols.wine.title@ symbols give 2x more coins. Gives 39 coins when destroyed.

policeman.title: Policeman
policeman.description: Destroys adjacent Thief. Gives 20 coins for each Theif destroyed.

bow_wooden.title: Wooden Bow
bow_wooden.description: Points a random direction. Symbols that are pointed to give 2x more coins. Destroys @symbols.target.title@ symbols that are pointed to.

bow_silver.title: Silver Bow
bow_silver.description: Points a random direction. Symbols that are pointed to give 3x more coins. Destroys @symbols.target.title@ symbols that are pointed to.

bow_golden.title: Golden Bow
bow_golden.description: Points a random direction. Symbols that are pointed to give 4x more coins. Destroys @symbols.target.title@ symbols that are pointed to.

bubble.title: Bubble
bubble.description: Destroys itself after giving coins 3 times.

buffing_capsule.title: Buffing Capsule
buffing_capsule.description: Destroys itself. Adjacent symbols give 2x more coins.

card_shark.title: Card Shark
card_shark.description: Adjacent @symbols.clubs.title@, @symbols.diamonds.title@, @symbols.hearts.title@ or @symbols.spades.title@ symbols give 2x more coins.

cat.title: Cat
cat.description: Destroys adjacent Milk. Gives 9 coins for each destroyed.

chemical_seven.title: Chemical Seven
chemical_seven.description: Destroys itself. Gives 7 coins and adds 1 item when destroyed.

chick.title: Chick
chick.description: Has a 10% chance to grow into Chicken.

chicken.title: Chicken
chicken.description: Has a 5% chance of adding Egg. Has a 1% chance of adding Golden Egg.

clubs.title: Clubs
clubs.description: Adjacent @symbols.clubs.title@ and @symbols.spades.title@ give 1 coin more. Gives 1 coin more if there are at least 3 @symbols.clubs.title@, @symbols.diamonds.title@, @symbols.hearts.title@ or @symbols.spades.title@ symbols.

crab.title: Crab
crab.description: Gives 3 coins more for each other Crab in the same row.

cultist.title: Cultist
cultist.description: Gives 1 coin more for each other Cultist. Gives 1 coin more if there are at least 3 Cultists.

dame.title: Dame
dame.description: Adjacent @tags.gem@ symbols give 2x more coins. Destroys adjacent @symbols.martini.title@ symbols and gives 40 coins for each.

diamond_gem.title: Diamond
diamond_gem.description: Gives 1 coin more for each other Diamond.

diamonds.title: Diamonds
diamonds.description: Adjacent @symbols.diamonds.title@ and @symbols.hearts.title@ give 1 coin more. Gives 1 coin more if there are at least 3 @symbols.clubs.title@, @symbols.diamonds.title@, @symbols.hearts.title@ or @symbols.spades.title@ symbols.

diver.title: Diver
diver.description: Removes adjacent @symbols.snail.title@, @symbols.turtle.title@, @symbols.anchor.title@, @symbols.crab.title@, @symbols.goldfish.title@, @symbols.oyster.title@, @symbols.pearl.title@, @symbols.jellyfish.title@, @symbols.pufferfish.title@ and permanently gives 1 coin for each.

dog.title: Dog
dog.description: Gives 1 coin more if adjacent to @tags.human@ symbols.

dove.title: Dove
dove.description: If an adjacent symbol would be destroyed, instead it isn't, and this symbol permanently gives 1 coin more.

dud.title: Dud
dud.description: Destroys itself after 33 spins. Cannot be removed.

dwarf.title: Dwarf
dwarf.description: Destroys adjacent Beer and Wine. Gives equal to 10x the value of symbols destroyed this way.

egg.title: Egg
egg.description: Has a 10% chance to transform into Chick.

eldritch_creature.title: Eldritch Creature
eldritch_creature.description: Destroys @symbols.cultist.title@, @symbols.witch.title@, @symbols.hex_of_destruction.title@, @symbols.hex_of_draining.title@, @symbols.hex_of_midas.title@, @symbols.hex_of_tedium.title@, @symbols.hex_of_thievery.title@ and permanently gives 1 coin for each.

emerald.title: Emerald
emerald.description: Gives 1 coin more if there are at least 2 Emerald symbols.

essence_capsule.title: Essence Capsule
essence_capsule.description: Destroys itself. Gives 1 coin when destroyed

frozen_fossil.title: Frozen Fossil
frozen_fossil.description: Destroys itself after 10 spins. Adds @symbols.eldritch_creature.title@ when destroyed.

gambler.title: Gambler
gambler.description: Gives ? coins when destroyed. ? increases by 2 each spin. Destroys itself when Three-Sided Die or Five-Sided Die rolls 1.

supervillain.title: Supervillain
supervillain.description: Destroys adjacent @tags.human@ symbols and gives 20 coins for each.

geologist.title: Geologist
geologist.description: Destroys adjacent @symbols.ore.title@, @symbols.big_ore.title@, @symbols.pearl.title@, @symbols.shiny_pebble.title@, @symbols.sapphire.title@ and permanently gives 1 coin for each.

goldfish.title: Goldfish
goldfish.description: Destroys adjacent Bubble. Gives 15 coins for each Bubble destroyed.

golem.title: Golem
golem.description: Destroys itself after 5 spins. Adds 5 @symbols.ore.title@ symbols when destroyed.

goose.title: Goose
goose.description: Has a 1% chance of adding Golden Egg.

hearts.title: Hearts
hearts.description: Adjacent @symbols.diamonds.title@ and @symbols.hearts.title@ give 1 coin more. Gives 1 coin more if there are at least 3 @symbols.clubs.title@, @symbols.diamonds.title@, @symbols.hearts.title@ or @symbols.spades.title@ symbols.

hex_of_destruction.title: Hex of Destruction
hex_of_destruction.description: Has a 30% chance to Destroy an adjacent symbol.

hex_of_draining.title: Hex of Draining
hex_of_draining.description: Has a 30% chance to make an adjacent symbol give 0 coins.

hex_of_emptiness.title: Hex of Emptiness
hex_of_emptiness.description: Has a 30% chance of forcing you to skip the symbols you can add after a spin.

hex_of_hoarding.title: Hex of Hoarding
hex_of_hoarding.description: Has a 30% chance of forcing you to add a symbol after this spin.

hex_of_midas.title: Hex of Midas
hex_of_midas.description: Has a 30% chance of adding a @symbols.coin.title@ symbol.

hex_of_tedium.title: Hex of Tedium
hex_of_tedium.description: You are 1.2x less likely to find Uncommon, Rare, and Very Rare symbols.

hex_of_thievery.title: Hex of Thievery
hex_of_thievery.description: Has a 30% chance to take 6 coins.

hooligan.title: Hooligan
hooligan.description: Destroys adjacent @symbols.urn.title@, @symbols.big_urn.title@ and @symbols.tomb.title@ symbols and gives 6 coins for each.

hustling_capsule.title: Hustling Capsule
hustling_capsule.description: Destroys itself. Adds 1 item when destroyed.

item_capsule.title: Item Capsule
item_capsule.description: Destroys itself. Adds 1 Common item when destroyed.

joker.title: Joker
joker.description: Adjacent @symbols.clubs.title@, @symbols.diamonds.title@, @symbols.hearts.title@ or @symbols.spades.title@ symbols give 3x more coins.

key.title: Key
key.description: Destroys adjacent @symbols.lockbox.title@, @symbols.safe.title@, @symbols.treasure_chest.title@ and @symbols.mega_chest.title@. Destroys itself afterwards.

king_midas.title: King Midas
king_midas.description: Adds a @symbols.coin.title@ symbol each spin. Adjacent @symbols.coin.title@ symbols give 3x more coins.

light_bulb.title: Light Bulb
light_bulb.description: Adjacent @tags.gem@ symbols give 2x more coins. Destroys itself after making other symbols give additional 5 times.

lucky_capsule.title: Lucky Capsule
lucky_capsule.description: Destroys itself. At least 1 of the symbols to add after this spin will be Rare or better.

magic_key.title: Magic Key
magic_key.description: Destroys adjacent @symbols.lockbox.title@, @symbols.safe.title@, @symbols.treasure_chest.title@ and @symbols.mega_chest.title@. Symbols destroyedthis way give 3x more coins. Destroys itself afterwards.

matryoshka_doll.title: Matryoshka Doll
matryoshka_doll.description: Destroys itself after 3 spins. Adds @symbols.matryoshka_doll_2.title@ when destroyed.

matryoshka_doll_2.title: Matryoshka Doll 2
matryoshka_doll_2.description: Destroys itself after 5 spins. Adds @symbols.matryoshka_doll_3.title@ when destroyed.

matryoshka_doll_3.title: Matryoshka Doll 3
matryoshka_doll_3.description: Destroys itself after 7 spins. Adds @symbols.matryoshka_doll_4.title@ when destroyed.

matryoshka_doll_4.title: Matryoshka Doll 4
matryoshka_doll_4.description: Destroys itself after 9 spins. Adds @symbols.matryoshka_doll_5.title@ when destroyed.

midas_bomb.title: Midas Bomb
midas_bomb.description: Destroys itself and all adjacent symbols. Symbols destroyed this way give equal to 7x their value.

mine.title: Mine
mine.description: Adds a @symbols.ore.title@ symbol each spin. Destroys itself after giving coins 5 times.

miner.title: Miner
miner.description: Destroys adjacent @symbols.ore.title@ and @symbols.big_ore.title@ symbols. Gives 20 coins for each @symbols.ore.title@ and @symbols.big_ore.title@ destroyed.

monkey.title: Monkey
monkey.description: Destroys adjacent @symbols.banana.title@, @symbols.coconut.title@ and @symbols.coconut_half.title@ symbols. Gives coins equal to 6x the value of symbols destroyed this way.

moon.title: Moon
moon.description: Adjacent @symbols.owl.title@, @symbols.rabbit.title@, @symbols.wolf.title@ give 3x more coins. Adds 3 @symbols.cheese.title@ when destroyed.

mouse.title: Mouse
mouse.description: Destroys adjacent @symbols.cheese.title@ symbols and gives 15 coins for each.

mrs_fruit.title: Mrs. Fruit
mrs_fruit.description: Destroys adjacent @symbols.banana.title@, @symbols.cherry.title@, @symbols.coconut.title@, @symbols.coconut_half.title@, @symbols.orange.title@, @symbols.peach.title@. Permanently gives 1 coin for each symbol destroyed.

ninja.title: Ninja
ninja.description: Gives 1 coin less for each other @symbols.ninja.title@.

omelette.title: Omelette
omelette.description: Gives 2 coins more if adjacent to @symbols.cheese.title@, @symbols.egg.title@, @symbols.milk.title@, @symbols.golden_egg.title@ or @symbols.omelette.title@.

ore.title: Ore
ore.description: Adds a symbol out of @symbols.amethyst.title@, @symbols.pearl.title@, @symbols.shiny_pebble.title@, @symbols.sapphire.title@, @symbols.emerald.title@, @symbols.ruby.title@ or @symbols.diamond_gem.title@ when destroyed.

pear.title: Pear
pear.description: Whenever another symbol makes this symbol give additional coins, this symbol permanently gives 1 more coins.

pirate.title: Pirate
pirate.description: Destroys adjacent @symbols.coin.title@, @symbols.anchor.title@, @symbols.beer.title@, @symbols.orange.title@, @symbols.lockbox.title@, @symbols.safe.title@, @symbols.treasure_chest.title@, @symbols.mega_chest.title@. Permanently gives 1 coin for each symbol destroyed.

present.title: Present
present.description: Destroys itself after 12 spins. Gives 10 coins when destroyed.

rabbit_fluff.title: Rabbit Fluff
rabbit_fluff.description: You are 1.2x more likely to find Uncommon, Rare, and Very Rare symbols.

rabbit.title: Rabbit
rabbit.description: Permanently gives 2 coins more after giving coins 10 times.

removal_capsule.title: Removal Capsule
removal_capsule.description: Destroys itself. Gives 1 Remove when destroyed.

reroll_capsule.title: Reroll Capsule
reroll_capsule.description: Destroys itself. Gives 1 Reroll when destroyed.

robin_hood.title: Robin Hood
robin_hood.description: Gives 25 coins every 4 spins. Adjacent @symbols.thief.title@, @symbols.bow_wooden.title@, @symbols.bow_silver.title@, @symbols.bow_golden.title@ give 3 coins more. Destroys adjacent @symbols.billionaire.title@, @symbols.target.title@, @symbols.apple.title@ symbols and gives 15 coins for each.

ruby.title: Ruby
ruby.description: Gives 1 coin more if there are at least 2 Ruby symbols.

seed.title: Seed
seed.description: Has a 25% chance to grow into a @symbols.void_fruit.title@, @symbols.banana.title@, @symbols.cherry.title@, @symbols.coconut.title@, @symbols.flower.title@, @symbols.pear.title@, @symbols.orange.title@, @symbols.peach.title@, @symbols.apple.title@, @symbols.strawberry.title@ or @symbols.watermelon.title@ symbol.

shiny_pebble.title: Shiny Pebble
shiny_pebble.description: You are 1.1x more likely to find Uncommon, Rare, and Very Rare symbols.

spades.title: Spades
spades.description: Adjacent @symbols.clubs.title@ and @symbols.spades.title@ give 1 coin more. Gives 1 coin more if there are at least 3 @symbols.clubs.title@, @symbols.diamonds.title@, @symbols.hearts.title@ or @symbols.spades.title@ symbols.

ghost.title: Ghost
ghost.description: Destroys itself after giving coins 4 times.

strawberry.title: Strawberry
strawberry.description: Gives 1 coin more if there are at least 2 Strawberry symbols.

tedium_capsule.title: Tedium Capsule
tedium_capsule.description: Destroys itself. At least 1 of the symbols to add after this spin will be Common.

thief.title: Thief
thief.description: Gives ? coins when destroyed. ? increases by 4 each spin. Destroys adjacent @symbols.banknote.title@ symbols and gives 10 coins for each.

time_capsule.title: Time Capsule
time_capsule.description: Destroys itself. Adds 1 symbol that was destroyed this game when destroyed. Cannot add .

toddler.title: Toddler
toddler.description: Destroys adjacent @symbols.present.title@, @symbols.candy.title@, @symbols.bubble.title@, @symbols.pinata.title@ and @symbols.milk.title@ a gives 6 coins for each.

tomb.title: Tomb
tomb.description: Has a 6% chance of adding a @symbols.ghost.title@ symbol. Adds 4 @symbols.ghost.title@ symbols when destroyed.

void_creature.title: Void Creature
void_creature.description: Adjacent Empty symbols give 1 coin more. Destroys itself if adjacent to 0 Empty symbols. Gives 8 coins when destroyed.

void_fruit.title: Void Fruit
void_fruit.description: Adjacent Empty symbols give 1 coin more. Destroys itself if adjacent to 0 Empty symbols. Gives 8 coins when destroyed.

void_stone.title: Void Stone
void_stone.description: Adjacent Empty symbols give 1 coin more. Destroys itself if adjacent to 0 Empty symbols. Gives 8 coins when destroyed.

watermelon.title: Watermelon
watermelon.description: Gives 1 coin more for each other Watermelon.

wildcard.title: Wildcard
wildcard.description: Gives equal to the highest value among adjacent symbols.

wine.title: Wine
wine.description: Permanently gives 1 coin more after giving coins 8 times.
